UniprotID	Q3C1V8
Accession	Q3C1V8
EntryName	BSH_HUMAN
ProteinName	Brain-specific homeobox protein homolog
GeneName	BSX BSX1
Length	233
Function	DNA binding protein that function as transcriptional activator. Is essential for normal postnatal growth and nursing. Is an essential factor for neuronal neuropeptide Y and agouti-related peptide function and locomotory behavior in the control of energy balance (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
